meaningMnemonic: You've been led <kanji>astray</kanji> and you've been <kanji>misguided</kanji>. What a <vocabulary>trouble</vocabulary>, and indeed a <vocabulary>troublesome</vocabulary> <vocabulary>inconvenience</vocabulary> all this is.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
